New Records: Corey Seager hit his 30th home run of the season, which also was his 200th career homer.
Key Match Events: Nick Nastrini allowed one run on three hits and one walk with three strikeouts over six innings.
Nathan Eovaldi allowed just a Gavin Sheets single with 10 strikeouts and two walks over seven innings.
Andrew Benintendi hit his 15th home run in the ninth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Nastrini reflected on his improved performance, attributing it to refining his mechanics and execution.
White Sox catcher Korey Lee praised Nastrini's elite pitches and improved mechanics.
Nastrini mentioned the support and guidance he received from teammates and coaches, including Dominic Leone and Charlotte pitching coach R.C. Lichtenstein.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox have been swept in 21 series and have yet to win a game this season when trailing after six, seven, or eight innings.
